article_title: Burr’s Washington profile on rise as chairman of Senate panel that focuses on terrorism
article_text:
Republican senator from Winston-Salem stresses record, clout in seeking third term

Challengers in GOP primary say Burr is Washington insider, not true conservative

Burr seen by Congress watchers as ‘serious person’ more interested in policy than politics

article_metadata.news-keywords: U.S. Sen. Richard Burr, Burr, North Carolina, Republican primary, Senate, Tim Funk
article_metadata.description: Low profile. Behind the scenes. Policy wonk – those are the descriptions that stuck to Republican Richard Burr for most of his 21 years in Congress.
article_metadata.title: Burr’s Washington profile on rise as chairman of Senate panel that focuses on terrorism | The Charlotte Observer
